Name: Shrine
About the game: Shrine is a first person shooter made in the Doom engine! Battle the nightmarish eldritch horde as Tusk, the skinless monstrosity! Annihilate a variety of horrific enemies with a load of unique and strange weapons. Travel through a variety of levels set in a retro Gothic Lovecraftian world! 8 Weapons to rampage your way through the Elder World 13 Enemies to Blast into giblets 16 challenging but fair levels to test your might against the eldritch Horde A thank you to Jberg for the standalone version!
Meta Title: Shrine: Apr 3, 2020, Scumhead and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shrine? Check out the release date (Apr 3, 2020), developer insights from Scumhead, and a complete game summary.
